name: lighting-command
description: Represents a BACnet Lighting Command, which encapsulates all parameters needed to control lighting levels and transitions, including operation type, target values, and timing.

fields.name: operation
fields.description: The lighting operation to be performed.

fields.name: target-level
fields.description: Optional target lighting level as a percentage (0-100%).

fields.name: ramp-rate
fields.description: Optional ramp rate in percent per second (0.1-100%).

fields.name: step-increment
fields.description: Optional step increment as a percentage for step operations (0.1-100%).

fields.name: fade-time
fields.description: Optional fade time in milliseconds (100ms to 24 hours).

fields.name: priority
fields.description: Optional priority level for the command (1-16, where 1 is highest priority).
